meanings.definition: Used to call attention to or express satisfaction with a result or outcome.
meanings.sent1: Voila! The cake is ready for the party.
meanings.sent2: I followed the recipe, and voila, a delicious meal!
meanings.sent3: Voila! The magician pulled a rabbit out of the hat.
meanings.sent4: With a flick of the wand, voila, the room was filled with light.
meanings.sent5: Voila! The puzzle was finally solved after hours of trying.

meanings.definition: Used to introduce a statement or explanation.
meanings.sent1: I love baking, voila, I decided to open a bakery.
meanings.sent2: She studied hard, voila, she passed the exam with flying colors.
meanings.sent3: He saved up enough money, voila, he bought his dream car.
meanings.sent4: The sun set behind the mountains, voila, the sky turned a beautiful shade of pink.
meanings.sent5: The seeds were planted, and voila, a garden bloomed in the backyard.
